channel.title: Requesting Help (Given Up, Tried Everything) *Please Read*
channel.description:
Hey guys ive tried everything... I really need help for 317's I need to code dragon claws spec. But... Ive serached everything, Tried everything And cant get it. I have done some of it. But You know how theres Class 20 right? I dont know what to put the animation+Spec under in the "Class20" i tried putting it at the top of the notepad. And it comes up with 100 Errors. I tried at the bottom And theres 74 Errors. Please help? With the Special + Animation, Ive done the 1st part (Adding Them)
Please help! Ill do anything but pay a cent.

item.title: Requesting Help (Given Up, Tried Everything) *Please Read*
item.dc:creator: @Baneful Baneful
item.description:
@Baneful wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:373889”][quote author=Baneful link=topic=469877.msg3435514#msg3435514 date=1292729208]
i think it goes in Class 8, not 20 and there are some pretty nice guides if you search in google.
[/quote]

Rep-- for being a dumbfuck

@OP The special attack is already in the 317 client, you must do it server-sided

Many tutorials around covering it, mostly here.[/quote]dude i’m just trying to help i’m new to coding too so stop being an ass…

Read full topic
item.source: Requesting Help (Given Up, Tried Everything) *Please Read*

i think it goes in Class 8, not 20 and there are some pretty nice guides if you search in google.
[/quote]

Rep-- for being a dumbfuck

Many tutorials around covering it, mostly here.[/quote]

I think you might have aids. If you think im a dumb fuck. i havent coded 317’s for a while. Ive stuck with 614’s, Think before you post. “Dumb fuck” (My referal to you)-- “Fat Fuck”
Gtfo. Were not on a comedy show. Stop trying to be a comedian.

Read full topic
